author: stefan2
msg: Make size statistics for cache-inprocess available in the root
struct because statistics dumps should also be available
before the pool gets destroyed but after the sub-pools already
have been destroyed.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/cache-inprocess.c
(inprocess_cache_t): add stats members
(erase_page, inprocess_cache_set): update SIZE counter
(svn_cache__create_inprocess): extend init code

author: fdmanana
msg: Merged revision 1081106 from trunk
Add replication ID version information to checkpoints
Now that we have versioned replication IDs (introduced by COUCHDB-810),
it's useful to know which version is being used in the replication
checkpoints. This is mostly for debugging purposes.
